name: The Scarecrows and the Gnome.
description:
Literally just the prototyping level for testing movement and other character systems,  story and other aspects not implemented. Have fun pretending to be a gnome and give feedback!

Press R or Y(on Xbox controller) to gather snowballs.

Press E or Right Trigger(on Xbox controller) to throw snowballs.

Space/A(xbox) to Jump.

Check out my other games:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.that3dbeegamegmail.com.ThatBee...
